item.title: EP 697 - Max Kremer: The Dad-Shaped Super Villain!
item.itunes:title: Max Kremer: The Dad-Shaped Super Villain!
item.description:
Today we meet the REAL President Biden, and then we start the saga of Max Kramer; a homeless video game developer who believes we aren’t trapping him in the Matrix, we are trapped here with him!
